oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame Medallion Ceremony - 2010-05-23 - Ferlin Husky, Billy Sherrill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Country Music Hall of Fame medallion ceremony held on May 23, 2010 from the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum's Curb Conservatory. Ferlin Husky and Billy Sherrill. In October of 2010, the inductees honored were Jimmy Dean and Don Williams.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vince Gill; the Settles Connection; Webb Wilder; Ronnie McDowell; the Jordanaires; Millie Kirkham; Ricky Skaggs; the Whites; Dallas Frazier; Larry Paxton; Charley Pride; Craig Morgan; Shelby Lynne; Ronnie Milsap; Lee Ann Womack; Frances Preston; Ferlin Husky; Billy Sherrill;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Welcome by Kyle Young -- Comments from Steve Turner -- "Oh, Happy Day" Vince Gill and the Settles Connection -- Ferlin Husky segment "I Feel Better All Over (More Than Anywhere's Else) Webb Wilder -- "Gone" Ronnie McDowell and the Jordanaires with Millie Kirkham "Wings Of A Dove" Ricky Skaggs and the Whites "Fredkles and Pollywog Days" Dallas Frazier and Larry Paxton -- Charley Pride with the presentation of medallion to Ferlin Husky -- Comments from Ferlin Husky -- Billy Sherrill segment "Almost Persuaded" Craig Morgan -- "Stand By Your Man" Shelby Lynne -- "The Most Beautiful Girl" Ronnie Milsap -- "He Stopped Loving Her Today" LeAnn Womack -- Frances Preston presents medallion to Billy Sherrill -- Comments by Billy Sherrill -- "Will The Circle Be Unbroken" assembled Country Music Hall of Fame members
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); Gill, Vince; Settles Connection (Musical group); Husky, Ferlin; Jordanaires (Musical group); Wilder, Webb; McDowell, Ronnie; Kirkham, Millie; the Whites (Musical group); Frazier, Dallas, 1939-; Paxton, Larry; Pride, Charley; Sherrill, Billy; Morgan, Craig; Lynne, Shelby; Milsap, Ronnie; Preston, Frances Williams, 1928-2012;
